info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 30 at 3:32AM CDT until June 30 at 5:30AM CDT by NWS Hastings NE
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of south central Nebraska, including the following county, Buffalo.
* WHEN...Until 530 AM CDT.
* IMPACTS...Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 330 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms in and near the city of Kearney. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area, particularly within Kearney itself. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen in the last 30 to 45 minutes, and another inch or so could fall within the next hour before heavy rain moves out. - Some locations that will experience minor flooding include... Kearney. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING
